Study Title: Apixaban for the Treatment of Venous Thromboembolism in Patients With Cancer
Brief Summary: Apixaban for the treatment of venous thromboembolism in patients with cancer: a prospective randomized open blinded end-point (PROBE) study
Primary Outcome Measures:
Recurrent venous thromboembolism, Primary efficacy outcome: objectively confirmed recurrent VTE occurring during the study period, that means the composite of:

· proximal DVT of the lower limbs (symptomatic or unsuspected), DVT of the upper limb (symptomatic), PE (symptomatic or unsuspected), 6 months
Study Design: Allocation: RANDOMIZED|Intervention Model: PARALLEL|Masking: NONE|Primary Purpose: TREATMENT
